entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the afternoon. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 5 except minus 11 inland.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5 except minus 11 inland. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023
